name: Hall Family's Christmas
description:
Link of the game because too heavy for itch

▬ Keybinds :

Interact : Left Mouse Button
Menu : Escape
Sprint : Left Shift
Next : E
Previous : A
-
Two languages available : English or French

▬ Tools :
